name: Deep Dive (nir9420)
description:
I create this game with Love 2d, I am a beginner and I try to practice my coding skill. It was to me a pretty cool challenge even if the result is not as I wanted.

If I had more time (create the map that is generated randomly) took me to much time but now I know how to do it (at least in this type of game), I would improve the collision systeml, add graphics effect, animation to the cube, more levels, bonus and a some songs.

Well if atleast one person play my game it would be very cool !
